slide1.title: Welcome to FODMAP Easy
slide1.description: Your personal guide to understanding food sensitivities through the FODMAP reintroduction protocol

slide2.title: Track Your Journey
slide2.description: Follow a structured 3-day testing protocol for each FODMAP group and monitor your body's responses

slide3.title: Log Symptoms Easily
slide3.description: Quickly record symptoms as they happen with our simple 3-tap logging system

slide4.title: Discover Your Triggers
slide4.description: Get personalized insights and build a diet that works for your unique body

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
IMPORTANT: Please Read Carefully

This application is designed to help you track and manage your FODMAP reintroduction journey. However, it is NOT a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

Before You Begin:

• Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider or registered dietitian before starting the FODMAP reintroduction protocol

• The FODMAP elimination diet should only be followed under professional supervision

• This app is intended for informational and tracking purposes only

• Individual results may vary, and what works for one person may not work for another

• If you experience severe symptoms or adverse reactions, stop immediately and consult your healthcare provider

• This app does not provide medical advice or replace the guidance of healthcare professionals

• The developers and publishers of this app are not responsible for any health outcomes resulting from use of this application

By continuing, you acknowledge that:

• You have read and understood this disclaimer

• You will consult with healthcare professionals before making dietary changes

• You understand this app is a tracking tool, not medical advice

• You accept full responsibility for your health decisions
disclaimer.acceptLabel: I understand and accept the terms above
disclaimer.acceptHint: Check this box to indicate you have read and accept the medical disclaimer
disclaimer.continueDisabledHint: You must accept the disclaimer to continue

assessment.title: Readiness Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Let's determine if you're ready to start the FODMAP reintroduction protocol

questions.q1: Have you completed at least 2-4 weeks of the FODMAP elimination phase?
questions.q2: How much have your symptoms improved during the elimination phase?
questions.q3: Are you working with a healthcare provider or registered dietitian?
questions.q4: How committed are you to following the 3-day testing protocol for each food group?
questions.q5: Do you understand the FODMAP reintroduction process and its requirements?
questions.q6: Do you have time to dedicate to tracking symptoms and following the protocol?

q4.very_committed: Very committed - I'm ready to follow it strictly
q4.committed: Committed - I'll do my best to follow it
q4.somewhat: Somewhat committed - I'll try but may struggle
q4.unsure: Unsure - I'm not sure I can commit

results.ready: Great news! You're ready to start the FODMAP reintroduction protocol. Your assessment shows you have the foundation needed for success.
results.notReady: Based on your responses, you may benefit from additional preparation before starting the reintroduction protocol.

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.completeElimination: Complete the full elimination phase (2-4 weeks) before starting reintroduction
recommendations.improveSymptoms: Continue the elimination phase until you see significant symptom improvement
recommendations.seekHealthcare: Consult with a healthcare provider or registered dietitian for guidance
recommendations.buildCommitment: Review the protocol requirements and ensure you're ready to commit
recommendations.learnMore: Learn more about the FODMAP reintroduction process and what to expect
recommendations.planTime: Plan your schedule to ensure you have time for the 3-day testing protocol

diary.title: Symptom Diary
diary.emptyDescription: Start tracking your symptoms to understand your body better and identify food triggers.

journey.noActiveTestsDescription: You haven't started any tests yet. Begin your FODMAP journey by starting your first food test.

testWizard.title: Food Test

dayInstructions.day1: Consume the recommended portion and monitor your symptoms for the next 24 hours.
dayInstructions.day2: If you had no severe symptoms yesterday, consume today's increased portion.
dayInstructions.day3: Final day! Consume the maximum portion and complete your symptom tracking.

generalTips: Consume the test food on an empty stomach or with a low-FODMAP meal
Wait at least 24 hours between test days
Log any symptoms as they occur
If you experience severe symptoms, stop the test and start a washout period
testWizard.cannotProgress: You must wait 24 hours before continuing to the next day

tolerance.highDescription: You tolerated this food well with minimal or no symptoms.
tolerance.moderateDescription: You experienced some mild symptoms but may tolerate smaller portions.
tolerance.lowDescription: You experienced moderate symptoms. Consider avoiding or limiting this food.
tolerance.noneDescription: You experienced severe symptoms. Avoid this food group.

validation.mustConfirmConsumption: You must confirm consumption before completing the day

offline.indicator: You're offline. Changes will sync when you reconnect.
